getFeedConfigurations().notice: Returns the feed configurations, including removed ones.

getFeedId(uint256).notice: Returns the feed id at a given index. Removed (unused) feed index will return bytes21(0).

getFeedIds().notice: Returns all feed ids. For removed (unused) feed indices, the feed id will be bytes21(0).

getFeedIndex(bytes21).notice: Returns the index of a feed.

getNumberOfFeeds().notice: Returns the number of feeds, including removed ones.

getUnusedIndices().notice: Returns the unused indices - indices of removed feeds.
